data.question: Q: How can I get admission to you?
data.answer: You make a call to Asim Roy Chowdhury @+91 9433255725, talk him about batch timings and join the batch as per telephonic conversation.

data.question: Q: Is there English medium tuition available?
data.answer: Yes it is. CBSE and ICSE both board's students can join

data.question: Q: How much time a batch can carry on?
data.answer: It depends. However it may vary between 4-6 hours.

data.question: Q: My child is specially abled student. Can he get admission there?
data.answer: Absolutely. He is just an ordinary student to us. We treat everyone equally here.

data.question: Q: When will the monthly fees be collected?
data.answer: We take fees in advance at the start of the month. Fees amount will be instructed during your telephonic conversation.

data.question: Q: What are the payment modes accepted here?
data.answer: As of now, we have cash only option. But we are working on to bring more services to you.
